item.title: Tokenomics of Bliss
item.description: I’ve spent a bit of time looking at various projects in crypto space and trying to make sense of them. This post tries to cover a vast part of space that is sometimes referred to as “tokenomics”.

item.title: Choosing Blog Platform
item.description: Ok, I know this blog so far is only about blogging, which is never a good sign, but I spent about a week looking at various platforms and frameworks, so there has to be something useful in all of that.

item.title: What Is This Blog
item.description: I plan to use this blog as a random collection of reports about my side projects and things that I learned or looked into along the way.

item.title: About
item.description: Software developer for 20+ years. Worked in companies large and small. Interested in: wrapping my head around new things; using data to satisfy my curiosity; data engineering; fighting fraud; improving performance and reliability of software systems. See What is this blog for more details.
